data.text: @USEmbassyAddis @USAIDEthiopia Again, I hope this is your official page! It’s like I’m witnessing reading miracle after miracle 🙏🏼

@USEmbassyAddis @EthiopiaResili1 @USAIDEthiopia I just wonder how on earth the Ethiopian Gov accepts anything from the US in good faith considering the US has been working tirelessly to destabilize Ethiopia and undermind the Ethiopian incumbent Gov in recent months. Shall we trust you this time??
@USEmbassyAddis @USAIDEthiopia Is it chinese made? who trusts ur's?

@USEmbassyAddis @USAIDEthiopia Do not pretend, you have to call it by its name, we Ethiopians believe it is not damaged by the conflict, rather it is intentionally, purposefully & target fully destroyed & looted #Amhara & #Afar by an evil #TPLFTerroristGroup with the full backing of the US government.
#NoMore
@USEmbassyAddis @USAIDEthiopia I am always with you guys. Keep up the good work.

@USEmbassyAddis @USAIDEthiopia Aid from @USAID partners has arrived by air in #Tigray,but not enough to meet ballooning needs. Planes carry less cargo at 25x the cost of truck convoys.Trucking means more food for war-torn Tigray,"but the Ethiopian government continues to block access for trucks." @PowerUSAID

@USEmbassyAddis @USAIDEthiopia What about Tigray?
You know it,it's impossible by the de facto blocked
